duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist Technical Designers with measuring and commenting for contemporary fashion brands.
Develop and measure samples prior to fitting, with knowledge of pattern making, fitting, and grading.
Manage time effectively in fitting and commenting processes.
Understand construction methods, terminology, and fabric types including Wovens, Cut & Sew Knits, and Sweater Knits.
Handle Technical Design details such as BOM, Colorways, Specs, Fit Comments, and explain clearly in TP fit comments.
Understand the Design Handoff procedure of Development and Production styles.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s in Fashion Design/Technical Design or Certification (Bachelor’s preferred)
